editor

Class Recorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • editor.Recorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable

    public final class Recorder
extends Object
implements Observable
    Recorder is to record the memento of commands as to replay them on the users' demand.
    See Also:
    CommandRecordable, MementoCommand

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      Clears the list of recorded memento (if there was any) and activate the record mode.
      void addObserver(Observer o)
      Add an observer in the list of observers on this object.
      void deactivate()
      Deactivates the record mode.

      Gets the record.

      Records the memento of a command.

      Remove an observer from the list of observers on this object.
      void replayCommands()
      Replay all the recorded commands from the corresponding recorded memento.

      • removeObserver

        public void removeObserver(Observer o)
        Description copied from interface: Observable
